{
    "package_type": "Security",
    "token_limit": 4000,
    "key_findings": [
        "OAuth Authentication Flow",
        "SSL/TLS Configuration",
        "JWT Token Management"
    ],
    "critical_files": [
        "/app/api/routers/auth_router.py",
        "/app/webui-next/src/utils/auth.js",
        "/app/api/security/token_manager.py"
    ],
    "security_enhancements": [
        "Implement robust token refresh mechanism",
        "Add multi-factor authentication support",
        "Enhance input validation and sanitization"
    ],
    "coordination_metadata": {
        "specialists": ["security-validator", "backend-gateway-expert"],
        "validation_requirements": [
            "Penetration testing of auth endpoints",
            "Verify token lifecycle management",
            "Test OAuth integration security"
        ]
    }
}
